To serve: 200ml/7fl oz double cream, whipped to soft peaks

steps: Spread the bread with half of the butter, and lay the plum slices on top. Sprinkle over the brown sugar, dot with the remaining butter and place on a baking tray in the oven for 4-5 minutes, or until the butter is melted and bubbling.
Serve the plum bruschetta with the cream and a dusting of icing sugar and cinnamon.
title: Sweet plum bruschetta with cinnamon cream
